name: GpuStateSystem
description: System plugin to the renderer to manage WebGL state machines.

methods.name: getColorTargets
methods.description: public static extension = { type: [ ExtensionType.WebGPUSystem, ], name: 'state', } as const; /** State ID / public stateId: number; /** Polygon offset / public polygonOffset: number; /** Blend mode / public blendMode: BLEND_MODES; /** Whether current blend equation is different */ protected _blendEq: boolean; /** GL context / protected gpu: GPU; /** Default WebGL State / protected defaultState: State; constructor() { this.defaultState = new State(); this.defaultState.blend = true; } protected contextChange(gpu: GPU): void { this.gpu = gpu; } /** Gets the blend mode data for the current state
